game_description: HollowMindZ Beta is playing in a world where a virus started the apocalypse. Your goal is to survive and acquire new skills and weapons. This game is still in development. It includes a playable level in an appartment, a mini-game in a prison, as well as an experimental dark store that you can discover with a flashlight.
review_1: It's pretty good bare bones at the moment, needs some polishing, maybe a couple of new zombie skins, and work on the weapons. Putting those aside I had pretty fun playing the little bit of story mode there was and then playing the mini games were great! The dark store actually scared me which is good because most horror games don't scare me, the inventory also needs a little work but I liked that there were different weapons to find and that all the doors and most drawers were searchable. I see this game becoming something great so I give it a 4/5
